description:
Take napping and relaxing to another level. The SkyLoft provides a flatter, more roomy laying space than traditional end-gathered hammocks, thanks to the spreader bar and adjustable end modes. Cinch one end up when you're hanging out to take in the views, then drop it when it's nap time to lower your head into a more comfortable sleeping position.

  • Light, durable NewWave™ nylon fabric resists stretching
  • DAC aluminum spreader bars prevent edges from closing you in
  • Simple adjustment lets you raise the ends when relaxing or lower them when sleeping
  • Stuff sack coverts into a pillow, with snap and webbing to hold it in place
  • Stretch pockets keep a book or tablet close at hand
name: ENO SkyLoft Hammock
